column4: everytime I try to run "wine app.exe" my computer jams up...there are several .wine folders each with random #s and letters in my home folder and everytime I try to use wine it creates one and jams up my computer

what card?
01:00.0 VGA compatible controller: VIA Technologies, Inc. S3 Unichrome Pro VGA Adapter (rev 01)
